s = input()

if s == s[::-1] and s[0:int((len(s)-1)/2)] == s[0:int((len(s)-1)/2)][::-1] and s[int((len(s)+3)/2)-1:] == s[int((len(s)+3)/2)-1:][::-1] and len(s)%2 != 0:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')


s = input()
a = s[:int((len(s)-1)/2)]
b = s[int((len(s)+3)/2)-1:]
print("Yes" if s == s[::-1] and a == a[::-1] and b == b[::-1] else "No")

s = input()

if s == s[::-1]:
    if s[:(len(s)-1)//2] == s[:(len(s)-1)//2][::-1]: # 前半分を判定
        if s[(len(s)+3)//2-1:] == s[(len(s)+3)//2-1:][::-1]: # 後半分を判定
            print('Yes')
            exit()

s = input()

if s == s[::-1]:
    if s[:len(s)//2] == s[:len(s)//2][::-1]:
        if s[(len(s)+3)//2-1:] == s[(len(s)+3)//2-1:][::-1] or s[(len(s))//2:] == s[(len(s))//2:][::-1]:
